price: Then when they see it[7] approaching closer, the faces of the disbelievers will be distressed, and it will be said, “This is what you were asking for[8].”
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَةٗ سِيٓـَٔتۡ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
footnotes:
[7] The punishment on the Day of Judgment of which they were warned.
 [8] As they were challenging their prophets, saying, "Bring upon us the punishment, if you are truthful."
